question: Do you think ____ tries to influence the internal affairs of other countries or do you think ____ mostly stays out of the internal affairs of other countries? e. Germany
options: Tries to influence the internal affairs of other countries
Mostly stays out of the internal affairs of other countries
raw_output:
Germany has historically played an active role in international affairs, frequently participating in diplomatic efforts, peacekeeping missions, and supporting international institutions. While it generally respects the sovereignty of other nations, its involvement in global economic, political, and security issues suggests it practices some level of influence beyond merely staying out of internal matters. Therefore, I believe Germany tries to influence the internal affairs of other countries.

ANSWER: A
